New Records: LeBron James secured his 114th career triple-double
Key Match Events: The Lakers made an 8-0 run into the break and a 10-0 surge shortly after it to take charge
Philadelphia erased an early 13-point deficit shortly before halftime
Pre-Game Insights: Experts' predictions or expectations were not mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: JJ Redick, the Lakers' coach, appeared to be pleased with his team's strategy, as indicated by his mercurial player D'Angelo Russell playing comfortably and aggressively as a reserve
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 39-year-old LeBron James has seven triple-doubles since he passed Tim Duncan one year ago to become the second-oldest player in NBA history to accomplish the feat
The Lakers remained unbeaten at home this season in their return from a 1-4 trip
Others: The Sixers dropped to 1-7 while playing without two of their top three players, Joel Embiid and Tyrese Maxey
